alert.note: Alert for Butte; Harding (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 5:15PM MDT until June 29 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN HARDING AND NORTH CENTRAL BUTTE COUNTIES... At 515 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles southeast of Buffalo to 5 miles north of Redig to 4 miles west of Crow Buttes, moving east at 40 mph. Wind gusts up to 60 mph were recently reported 3 miles southeast of Harding. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Reva and Slim Buttes. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
